fittingMethod.title: Fitting method
fittingMethod.description: Overwrite `fittingMethod` parameter to select a different method

largeGridStepRatio.title: Large grid step ratio
largeGridStepRatio.description: Multiplicative factor of the redshift step size for the first pass: firstpassz step = step * largeGridStepRatio. To use finegrid step, set largegridstep to 0 or 1

tplRatioIsmFit.title: Wether to activate ISM extinction fit

multipleContinuumFitDisable.title: Wether to use only the best continuum template
multipleContinuumFitDisable.description: Wether to overwrite the `continuumFit.count` parameter to keep only the best continuum template (true=> sets `continuumFit.count` to 1)

extremaCount.title: Maximum number of first pass candidate to retain
extremaCount.description: Maximum number of first pass candidate to retain
